item.title: Consulting Services
item.description: Consulting Services Findop Solutions LLC provides technical consulting services on Helping you identify the right tools from control theory, optimization, machine learning, and data sciences for your specific engineering applications Prototyping control algorithms (e.g., PID, LQR, Adaptive, Robust, Learning-based) for various applications (e.g., ACC, steering control) Reviewing planning and control architecture and algorithms design Simulink/Simscape modeling and model-based-design Literature review / patent research on autonomous driving and robotics related inventions (Note that due to my current engagement with ClearMotion, I will not be able to work on things related to active vehicle suspension systems)

item.title: Happy New Year!
item.description: Happy New Year! (Watching Boston 2022 First Night Fireworks across Charles River)

item.title: About
item.description: About me Findop Solutions LLC is a technical consulting company founded in early 2020 by me, Yu Jiang. I hold a PhD degree in Electrical Engineering (minored in Mathematics) from the New York University (NYU), and I am specialized in formulating and solving optimization and control problems in autonomous driving and robotics in general. I am based in the Greater Boston Area, MA. See My Homepage for more details about me.
